Children

<@render_children_node node listChildren(node) "" 0/> <#macro render_children_node currentNode currentChildren basePath currentlevel> <#if (currentChildren?size>0)>
    <#list currentChildren?keys?sort as child>
  • ${currentChildren[child].node.name}
    • <#if (currentlevel<20)> <@render_children_node currentChildren[child].node listChildren(currentChildren[child].node) basePath+"/"+currentChildren[child].node.name currentlevel+1/>
<#macro application_settings currentCollection> <#list currentCollection?keys?sort as key> <#if (key?starts_with("_"))>
${displayPropertyName(key)}${currentCollection[key].displayableValue}
